name: Artwork
description: This designer's work beautifully captures the essence of each country, using vibrant colors and intricate patterns that reflect the culture and landscapes.

name: Traditional attire
description: Thabo Morake is a young, passionate designer from Mafikeng who specializes in creating stunning traditional attire. Drawing inspiration from his rich cultural heritage, he blends vibrant fabrics with modern silhouettes, making his designs both contemporary and deeply rooted in tradition.

name: Jewelry
description: This jewelry designer crafts exquisite pieces that blend elegance with complex detailing, each one a wearable work of art.

name: Handy Crafts
description: Yanda Mazibuko is an artist that infuses creativity and care into every handcrafted piece, blending traditional techniques with modern aesthetics.

name: Historic art
description: Each piece tells a story, transforming key moments in history into visually stunning narratives that resonate with modern audiences.

name: Traditional blankets
description: This designer crafts exquisite traditional blankets, blending cultural heritage with intricate patterns and high-quality materials
